name: Petanque Bocce On Line
description:
True Multiplayer mode, ultra-realistic physics, beautiful sceneries and different balls with their own characteristics make Petanque Bocce On Line the most realistic Bocce/Petanque simulation.

-True Server Based Multiplayer mode or local multiplayer
-Hyper-intuitives controls
-Point or shoot
-Throw sitting or standing 
-Make lobs
-Choose amongst 6 sceneries and 6 balls
